name: F|sHy bAka
description:
This is just a completely normal game. Specifically completely normal minigame. Oridinary product with simple goals and mildly difficult gameplay for normal guys like you, me and your dog fish.

Just collect 69 of moving objects, avoid big bad monster after it arrives and don't crash into wall at the full speed. You can touch the walls, you can bounce of the walls, just not at the full speed.

No plot twists. No subverting expectations, which you as a customer are not allowed to have anyway. No trying to haunt you in your dreams or drill your soul.
